description: Unique escape room game that uses pen & paper. Search for hints, jot down notes on the maps, and seek out magic to exorcise all the ghosts to escape!

Title: Witch It
description: Witch It is a multiplayer hide & seek game set in a vibrant, magical world. Brave hunters seek hidden witches that curse their villages!

Title: UndercoverAgent
description: Undercover agent Saki has been given a new mission. She has to locate the headquarters of a criminal organization, steal their secret data, and destroy their facilities.

Title: Merry XMerge
description: Merry XMerge is a good board game for all ages this Christmas. Put together Christmas cakes and candies to make them more attractive. Merry Christmas.

Title: Oyabu Clinic Deathcare Corporation
description: Alchemy with patients' lives and health insurance! A quack doctor simulation game. DON'T imitate any of this!

Title: Bloodecay
description: A deadly plague known as erosion broke out in the land of Elworth. It corrupted all life, bringing pain and destruction – Idonia, as the knight accepting the bloodthirsty imprint set out on a path to redemption, exterminating plague minions and destroying ancient evils

Title: Madorica Real Estate 2 - The mystery of the new property -
description: The note-taking, floor-plan based real estate mystery game is back and bigger than ever, with even more puzzles to solve!In this game, visit properties and solve puzzles by noting down information and clues on a printed floor plan.

Title: Nursery Slime
description: He was an adventurer who standing at a dead-end. Because he had to return to his old business as his livelihood, he met a strange slime in a quest. The slime, which is brought his home, not only suddenly became a beautiful girl, but even fell in love with him at her first sight.

Title: Archmage Ricka
description: In order to retrieve the illegal property embezzled by the evil Lord, Ricka received a mission to capture the Lord. But it was a trap. She fell into a dungeon arranged by the Lord in advance. Although the demons in the dungeon are weak, the existence of various traps makes it difficult to escape!

Title: Hot Spring Hero
description: It's a hot spring hotel in the mountains. Goofy hostess, greedy dog ear cook, and cat ear fisher, even the goddess of hot spring were involved, to revive this hot spring hotel! The adventure life with lovely heroines day and night, is waiting for your coming!

Title: MudRunner
description: MudRunner is the ultimate off-road experience putting the players in the driver seat and dares them to take charge of incredible all-terrain vehicles, venturing across extreme Siberian landscapes with only a map and compass as guides!

Title: RectRacer
description: Racing on rectangular platforms! In the world of RectRacer, you can design your own levels and compete with your friends in a fun and exciting race on rectangular platforms with four game modes: Solo, Simple Play, Online and Party.

Title: Frog Story : The Power Tongue
description: Join a thrilling journey with a tiny frog and its mighty tongue, collecting fireflies and sealing the shadows of the Dark Toad King. Navigate through a charming puzzle-platformer world across 96 carefully crafted levels.

Title: The eagle keita
description: An eagle is about to lay an egg. She has lost her mate and has to face the rest of her life alone: constantly getting food and bringing it back to the nest.

Title: Home and Dungeon
description: Embark on an adventure in a fantasy world where you can collect items, build towns, and live the slow life of your dreams - these are the main features of this RPG game! Beyond the standard RPG gameplay, there are various other elements to enjoy.

Title: 3D Hentai Puzzle
description: 2 games in one - classic puzzle, where you need to put all the fragments of image in the right places and the game "40 numbers", in which you need to guess a random number between 0 and 40. And as a reward you will receive nude images.

Title: Poseidon - Project Dark Sky
description: Poseidon is a naval war simulation video game and is a precursor to the massive concept of Aegis 2 which is in production. The game concept for Poseidon is "Navies of the world unite against terrorists who are hell-bent to destroy an oil rig with a classified cargo".

Title: Unknown Soul With Me
description: This is a game where you play as a young girl abandoned in a dungeon. who was saved by a mysterious spirit The spirit introduced himself as having lived in this place. But can't go anywhere The young girl wanted to set this soul free. They worked together to find a way out of this place.

Title: The Legend of Yan Loong 1+2
description: A nostalgic collections of the chapter 1 and 2 of “Yan Loong Legend” series. Pick up your sword again, transform into Yan Loong, Zhi Loong or Shui Yan with your friends to have a battle of light and darkness with the final boss Bai Loong and regain the occupied Green Hill Lake.

Title: BegieAde ~a lyric of lie and retribution~
description: Tereza, the captain of kingdom knight, was defeated by the bandit boss Duardo who has got evil power after Tereza's team captured him. The succubus girl, Lyric, who gave the evil power to Duardo, said she needs Tereza's help to defeat Duardo.

Title: MECHANICA: A Ballad of the Rabbit and Mercury
description: 5029 AD, "Guillotine", the Japanese territory on Mercury, a city full of neon signs and drunks. You will explore the beautiful cyberpunk-style 2D world, play music to the residents of Mercury to gather intelligence, and finally achieve the goal of saving the world.

Title: The fairy tale you don't know
description: 《Little Red Riding Hood》，《Snow White》，《Alice in Wonderland》，《Thumbelina》……， Let's travel to these well-known fairy tales' world, and play hide and seek with the heroines! In this game, you can rewrite the ending of these well-known fairy tales.

Title: I'm a sardine Keita
description: The game tells the story of friends of sardine Keita who were captured by other animals on the way of migration, and Keita rescued his friends.

Title: Kingdom Rush  - Tower Defense
description: Get ready for an epic journey to defend your kingdom against hordes of orcs, trolls, evil wizards and other nasty fiends using a vast arsenal of towers and spells at your command!Fight on forests, mountains and wastelands, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations!

Title: Beholder 3
description: When a high-ranking security officer saves you from prison, you end up a pawn in her schemes. Now you must eliminate anyone standing in the way of her secret plans and try to get your life back while working two jobs. No tenant, employee or superior is safe from your spying.

Title: I am not a Monster: First Contact
description: Retro sci-fi tactical turn-based strategy with an exciting storyline. The Albatross space liner is overrun by lizard-like monsters that can infect humans and turn them into their own kind. Save the passengers and defeat the hostile creatures.

Title: Phantom Alchemy ~Silvia's Dynamic Urban Planning~
description: In order to make up for the corruption committed by her father, Silvia had to help the development of the border city as an alchemist. But if she wants to use alchemy, she must convert the spiritual power of residents into energy.

Title: Kingdom Rush Origins - Tower Defense
description: Command your elven army and defend mystical lands from sea serpents, evil sorcerers, and wave after wave of gnoll tribesman, all with the help of brand-spankin’ new towers, heroes, and spells to fend off every last baddie.

Title: The Winning Secret of the Newbie Strategist Princess
description: A neighboring country has declared war! The first war in a long time. Due to a shortage of personnel, Estelle, the princess, has taken command of the army. She can't afford to lose this war, but... What will she do, Estelle!?

Title: Atomic Heart
description: In a mad and sublime utopian world, take part in explosive encounters. Adapt your fighting style to each opponent, use your environment and upgrade your equipment to fulfill your mission. If you want to reach the truth, you'll have to pay in blood.

Title: Beholder 2
description: You are an intern at the central ministry of a totalitarian state with your whole career ahead of you. Work your way up the ladder by scheming against employees, spying on your boss, and completing paperwork. Or do you turn against the state and expose corruption. The choice is still yours to make!

Title: Iron Marines
description: Real-time strategy battles in amazing sci-fi worlds! Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas and powerful aliens to face the greatest challenges in hostile alien worlds. The galaxy needs you!

Title: Love Is All Around
description: The player becomes Gu Yi, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting six beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Six girls that are charming, innocent, intelligent, wild, sexy, glamorous, who will go to the end with you is up to you to decide.

Title: Kingdom Rush Vengeance - Tower Defense
description: It's payback time! Lead your mighty dark army and make the Kingdom tremble with every step. Build powerful towers, choose your arsenal for destruction, and find the deadliest combination - train legendary heroes and lead them to victory!

Title: EXIT KUN
description: You are trapped in the IKUN passage. Carefully observe: singing, dancing, rap, and basketball so you can leave here. Look carefully and reach the "Exit Kun ".A meme game inspired by Exit 8.

Title: Maumau and the Labyrinth
description: Maumau, an adventurer, found a huge treasure chest in an ancient ruin. However, she was taken into the other dimension by the girl who appeared from the treasure chest. Maumau's unique adventure to survive begins.

Title: Gypsy Retro TV Media Player
description: Gypsy Retro TV Media Player as its name suggests offers an experience of viewing any movie in the TV frame of the bygone era. To enthuse the viewers, an environment of wilderness, with flora and fauna is present. The viewer is reminded of the glories of the good old days and nostalgia is aroused.

Title: HAITENAI RPG
description: The amnesiac protagonist awakens in the world of Dehaina, a land where all nature is supported by the power of mysterious "Orbs". Not all is well, however, as a demonic invasion threatens the balance and the Orbs' power is fading away.

Title: Is It Wrong to Repay the Debt in a Dungeon?
description: To repay the debt, both Akane and her mother have to earn a lot of money! Explore the dungeon, challenge strong enemies, and even use her own body! Everything she is trying to do is for saving her family!!

Title: Blade of the Netherworld
description: Blade of the Netherworld is a fast-paced 2D Roguelite platformer. Don divine masks as a Yin-Yang Enforcer, slashing through the underworld to defeat gods, demons, and spirits. Combine a variety of items, master combat skills, and create limitless, high-speed carnage with a free-form action system.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Abnormal Status ~Tattoo / Prohibited Books / Parasites~
description: In the present day, the majority of the human race has become capable of using magic. The sudden rise of this power has not been met with adequate laws and regulations, and the world is rapidly becoming a wasteland as crimes and discrimination intensify.

Title: Strazeal
description: A digital strategy board game for 2 - 4 players. Capture your opponent's bases while protecting all of your own using land, water and special weapons.

Title: ANONYMOUS HUNTING SIMULATOR
description: ANONYMOUS HUNTING SIMULATOR is a dynamic first-person shooter. Your task is to explore the location and collect ten masks to complete the level.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: Midnight Mahjong
description: Somewhere in Tokyo, in an exclusive mahjong Club. Rei is a clerk in this club. Her job is to play Mahjong with the guests. Players will operate Rei and play with 3 guests in the authentic Japanese Mahjong. Dead wall draw and Last tile from the wall... It all depends on your skills!!

Title: Kingdom Rush Frontiers - Tower Defense
description: Command your troops through an epic (mis)adventure as you defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy new towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your foes in this Fantasy Action Tower Defense game!

Title: YAKIMOCHI STREAM
description: 『ヤキモチストリーム』は、まどそふとより発売された学園コメディーアドベンチャーゲームです。本作はまどそふとの2作目にあたる作品で、とても人気が高く、発売当初日本萌えゲーアワード2014にて金賞・プロモーション賞を受賞しました。

Title: Anime And Your Life
description: This is more than a game. This is your whole life!

Title: Guns of Succubus
description: You will play as Nico, a kind-hearted boy, using an assault rifle transformed by a succubus called Millfeuijonk, You can enjoy high-speed "Bullet Hell" when you dodging the enemy's bullets coming from all directions.

Title: Deplau
description: Deplau is a gesture based single player VR action/adventure game where you are a sorcerer trying to reclaim stolen magic. Discover the island of Deplau, evade traps, solve puzzles, fight monsters and take back what's yours.

Title: Right or DIE!
description: Navigate an ever changing maze where every turn could be your last...

Title: High School Odyssey
description: A campus simulation game full of tons of surprising interactive gameplay elements along the way.

Title: Enatus Radi
description: After the protagonist wakes up, he finds that he has lost his memory. The first girl he met named Ena also lost her memory. In order to find the reason and the truth, they embarked on a journey to the world.

Title: Tiny Jump
description: Tiny Jump is a first person precision platformer, in this game you will control a ball but in first person perspective, The main goal of the game is to climb all the way to the top while facing difficult types of jumps & challenges.

Title: Disney Planes
description: From above the world of “Cars”, Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster, voiced by actor and comedian Dane Cook. Embark on global missions and grand adventures around the world.

Title: KARAKARA2
description: KARAKARA. It is the sound of aridity. It is the sound of dry asphalt and sandy winds. It is the sound of relentless sunshine, as well as the sound of a withering race.

Title: Lux Alliance
description: Lux Alliance is a synchronized-turns strategy war game, inspired by the classic boardgames RISK, Diplomacy and Axis & Allies. Marshall your troops, collaborate with your allies, anticipate your opponents, and capture all the enemy HQs to win!

Title: Birth ME Code
description: The second entry of the Abime Series. Play as the mastermind in a death game where you must find the traitor while concealing your identity. Six hours, one school, six deaths. Nine participants fight for survival: it's kill or be killed, trust or deceive, escape or die.

Title: Love Rhythm
description: Behind the hustle and bustle of Seoul City lies many unqiue stories. It’s revolving love, ambition and even hatred and crime.

Title: Worms W.M.D
description: The worms are back in their most destructive game yet. With a gorgeous, hand-drawn 2D look, brand new weapons, the introduction of crafting, vehicles and buildings plus the return of some much-loved classic weapons and gameplay, Worms W.M.D is the best worms experience ever.

Title: Romeow: to the cracked Mars
description: Romeow has a big mission, to go to Mars. Go through messy paths and help him get there. Collect the spaceship components and place the cat flag on the orange planet. Enjoy this relaxing puzzle with him.

Title: Neighbours back From Hell
description: There goes the neighborhood! Play the star of a cheeky TV Show who taking revenge on his horrible neighbor by constantly pranking him at home and around the world in the most creative and ludicrous ways.

Title: Dark Pathways
description: You wake up in your cell, but this time the door is open and strange creatures will chase you across amazing worlds. You have to look for objects and tools scattered in the labyrinth that can be used to finally stop this threat. Only then you can come back to the peace of your cell.

Title: Fate Seeker II
description: Following the previous one, “Fate Seeker II” character development, thinking and exploration and other elements. You can experience real-time combat without switching scenes, and feel the delightful martial arts anytime.
Publisher: 甲山林娛樂股份有限公司

Title: Farm Frenzy 4
description: The Farm Frenzy series of casual sims gets a makeover in this sequel. Choose and dress your character, and then get busy saving the family farm! Virtual farming has never been more fun, so grab yer overalls, roll up yer sleeves and get ready for an egg-crackin', cow-milking, sheep-shearin' good time!

Title: XOMBEE
description: 1st/3rd Person view Single or Multiplayer Zombie Shooter

Title: Swordsman Night King
description: Swordsman Night King is a small game that combines bilingual Chinese and English language, as well as some English pronunciation, to pass levels. Very suitable for playing when feeling tired from long hours of work and 3A games.

Title: CRASH TEST IDIOTS 2 (MULTIPLAYER)
description: CRASH TEST IDIOTS 2 (MULTIPLAYER) - You and Your Steam Friends must Destroy every car in the city.

Title: Task Force 1942: Surface Naval Action in the South Pacific
description: A Long Lance torpedo rips through the hull of your flagship. Huge columns of water from enemy gunfire surround your battleships. It's just another day in Task Force 1942, the first in a new series of spectacular World War II Pacific War simulations from MicroProse.

Title: Elysium: Blood Games
description: Enter a world of blood, influence and secrets in this easy to learn, yet deep strategy sim where you control a group of Gladiators, guiding them through combat and competition. Bribe, gamble and slash your way to an arena championship!

Title: Crisis Brigade 2 reloaded
description: Crisis Brigade 2 reloaded is about covering, pointing and shooting, fast-paced pure action. Intense shootouts, powerful weapons, challenging levels, fierce enemies... Like the 90's classic arcade machines, but with the immersion that Virtual Reality is capable of.

Title: Ray of Light
description: Ray of Light is a horror game with awesome graphics, perfect sound and unexpected twists of plot. This game never lets you get bored.

Title: Abscission
description: Abscission is a Lovecraftian, story-driven horror point-and-click investigation game. It involves searching crime scenes for evidence, combining clues and questioning suspects. Puzzles can have multiple solutions as you guide the protagonist - Detective Will Stanhope - through the story.

Title: Vigil: The Longest Night
description: Embark on a journey through the longest night with Leila, a valiant member of the Vigilant Order. Delve into the hidden truths shrouded in eternal darkness, unravel the mystery surrounding Leila's enigmatic sister, and confront the eldritch horrors lurking in a world that has lost the light of day.

Title: Disney Winnie the Pooh
description: Winnie the Pooh The Video Game is based on the movie of the same name. Following the same story as the movie, Winnie the Pooh is an interactive story book focused on delivering action-driven storytelling and incorporating educational content for children.

Title: The Island
description: The Island - "Island") - a computer game with an open world and a first-person view in the genre of survival.

Title: Night Stroll
description: An ordinary girl named "Suzuki Rika" who can be found anywhere. It all started with an adult magazine, and the exhibitionism play began. From not wearing skirts to walking around completely naked, experiencing the pleasure of shame through exhibitionism.

Title: Silent Service 2
description: The all-new Silent Service II A State Of The Art Simulation Of Submarines In World War II!

Title: Unboxing the Cryptic Killer
description: Unravel the mystery of a cryptic box in this 2-player co-op puzzle game. Join forces as two detectives, solve cooperative puzzles, communicate effectively, crack the codes and outsmart the killer.

Title: Police Response VR : Disturbance
description: Experience an original cartoon reality. Quick Reactions based SIM. Have you got the weapon drawing skills to cope in pressure situations? Set at 1 Disturbance address. Toughest Police SIM Game you'll play!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Sleep Paralysis: The Uncanny Valley
description: This is a story-rich, first-person psychological horror game. Experience Thomas’ trauma through different horrifying sleep paralysis episodes. Find yourself in an ever-worsening state... until one day you awaken in an uncanny and strange place... Decide your fate with meaningful decisions.

Title: Disney's Treasure Planet: Battle of Procyon
description: Disney's Treasure Planet: Battle at Procyon is a 3D RTS game focusing on space combat.

Title: First Impact: Rise of a Hero
description: First Impact: Rise of a Hero immerses you in a beautiful comic book world where you can run, jump, fly, and summon elemental powers to protect citizens. Experience a lush array of islands and cityscapes and uncover the truth about a mysterious force sending meteors to Earth. For PC & VR!

Title: Ninja Stealth 4
description: He's back!

Title: Digital Diamond Baseball V10
description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a statistically accurate baseball simulator and tabletop board game companion.

Title: Death Roads: Tournament
description: Combine deadly racing, deckbuilding, and roguelite style to get car battles unlike anything before! Choose a driver, car, weapons, and sponsors to overcome tactical encounters. Adapt to an ever-changing race to come out on top and earn entry into the last safe haven on the Divided States of America.

Title: Kings Of Wings
description: A fast, fun and dangerous adventure...

Title: Ends
description: A highway gothic horror. Your bus was late and now you can't catch your next bus home. You'll need to walk the next couple of miles... alone... at night.

Title: Bellatia
description: Bellatia is a hack 'n' slash action role-playing game about warriors fighting over the ultimate godly weapon called the 'Bellatia' in the land of Aslan.

Title: Detective Kobayashi - A Visual Novel
description: Take on the role of Detective Kobayashi, the one and only genius detective who has a reputation for solving any case, however dark or difficult...if he isn't playing games at the office or awkwardly hitting on girls, that is.

Title: Vagabond
description: Explore procedurally generated living worlds in this 2D sandbox RPG. Meet hundreds of characters in cities, complete quests, craft powerful items, buy and furnish your home or fight monsters in dungeons.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access

Title: AI Battle Royale Generator
description: Generate your own Battle Royale simulations filled with Artificial Intelligences trained using machine learning! If you are a Twitch.tv streamer, your viewers can create their own AI and join the battle! There are more than 100 million playable maps!

Title: Project:EagleBeak
description: Project:EagleBeak is a mix of multiple modes of science fiction adventure game.You will play as a prisoner called ANN,imprisoned in an alien laboratory,find a way out of this matrix like laboratory.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Ben 10
description: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max once again have their cross-country road trip in the Rust Bucket cut short by super villains and their evil, world-threatening plans. As Ben Tennyson, it’s up to you to save the world.

Title: Emanate
description: Welcome to Emanate. Leap your way to the top with high-speed movement and high-stakes parkour obstacles. Experience Emanate's atmospheric environment and fast paced soundtrack as you jump your way to freedom in this single-level, vertical 3D platformer.

Title: Gardens and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

Title: 69 Yuki Love
description: 69 Yuki Love Allows you to plunge into an exciting and fairly simple puzzle. Your devoted girl Yuki the cat, together with relaxing music and meditative gameplay, will allow to have a good rest after work .

Title: Ladderhead
description: A surreal narrative focused roguelite text adventure. In it you play a man stuck in the same day who has to get to the top floor of an unusual building to find his loved one. Each floor is a perilous mystery to unravel. Each time you die the day resets.

Title: Words of Yendor
description: A word game RPG roguelike where you collect resources, solve dangerous situations and prepare for a showdown with each Master Villain to discover the meaning behind the Word of Yendor!

Title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 brings the experience of the original game to an unparalleled level. The enhanced graphics pay tribute to the comic books and the gameplay has been totally redesigned to make fighting the Romans even more fun!

Title: WORDLAND - Let's Travel
description: Must-visit places in the world! Test your knowledge about places and monuments around the world, arrange the pieces and discover the words.

Title: Command HQ
description: In this fast-paced game of strategic global conquest from award-winning game designer Dan Bunten, you'll control your own superpower as you attempt to outguess and overcome opposing superpowers in World Wars I, II, III IV, and V!

Title: Hentai Animation Puzzle
description: Hentai Animation Puzzle is a hentai puzzle game for adults, where your goal is to put all the pieces together to reveal a HENTAI image or animation and relax with original and handmade arts.

Title: Alice's Patchworks 2
description: Assemble patchwork mosaics, meet your favorite heroes from the world beyond the looking glass and help Alice become the queen!

Title: Fruit Salad
description: Drop adorable fruit to merge them and create even larger fruit in this cozy physics puzzle game!

Title: Across the Rhine
description: Armoured combat from D-day to the end of the war in Europe!

Title: Myths Of Orion: Light From The North
description: Use your sharp eye, pure heart and all of your wits to defeat the evil in this exciting fantasy hidden object puzzle adventure game!

Title: Cyberpunica 2.0.2.0
description: Cyberpunica 2.0.2.0 is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Zen Chess: Mate in One
description: ZenChess: Mate in One is a minimalist chess puzzle game. Solve mate-in-one problems in a beautifully designed chess board.

Title: Hentai Cuties
description: The game is a classic puzzle. You have to go through all ten stages, as well as three levels of difficulty, in which pleasant surprises await you ;-)

Title: Internal Storm
description: This game let you dive into the nostalgia atmosphere of the old-school text-based PC games. You’ll have only few commands to use. So the key to success is your attention and imagination.

Title: Murder In Tehran's Alleys 2016
description: This is the story of the time when narcotics impair the brain; the time when a father’s hallucination becomes the dawn of his family’s demise by slicing them into pieces for a sin they have not committed; the time when revenge is the only reason to live.

Title: WizardPunk
description: Engage in a magical showdown! Select your mage, wield elemental powers, and clash in an epic wizard tournament. Embrace nostalgia with a modern twist, choose your guild and embark on an enthralling roguelite RPG adventure.

Title: DreamWorks Spirit Lucky's Big Adventure
description: Explore the wild frontier with Lucky’s faithful mustang, Spirit, and best friends, Abigail and Pru. Where will friendship, and a mysterious treasure map lead you?

Title: Multiplayer Turtles
description: Multiplayer Turtles - Evil Frogs are attacking the Turtle Temple. You and Your elite team must Hack & Slash Your way to get rid of the invaders.

Title: Negligee: Love Stories (all ages)
description: A series of four stories following the characters Karen, Charlotte, Sophie and Jasmin in their early lives as they have to choose what they really love and what path their lives will take.

Title: Crazy Mafioso
description: Crazy Mafioso is a addicting multi-level survival game. Don`t let yourself be killed! Upgrade your barricades, weapons and gun power. Kill and earn game money.

Title: NEKO-MIMI SWEET HOUSEMATES Vol. 1
description: What is one to do when face to face with a cat-eared, winged angel? Life will never be the same when the angel, Mint, moves in and becomes your new housemate. Follow Mint, a popular girl from the doujin circle "Animal Herb," as she stars in this brand new, heart-warmingly comedic game!

Title: Crossfire: Sierra Squad
description: Fierce military arcade shooter in VR for single-player and co-op multiplayer. Drop into a variety of indoor and outdoor battle scenes with 63 missions, 39 different weapons, and 17 types of enemies as you lead an elite fireteam into immersive 360° combat.

Title: Escape from Chernobyl: Jailbreak
description: The plot of the game will tell the story of the mysterious prisoner E-0308, who found himself in prison for a special content of the ER-03 project, near the town of Pripyat

Title: Townsmen - A Kingdom Rebuilt
description: Townsmen – A Kingdom Rebuilt hands the crown to you: Guide your people from their first steps in a small village to a massive medieval metropolis with thousands of inhabitants.

Title: Bear Adventures
description: Go through the levels collecting honey, set a time record, kill animals. In BEAR ADVENTURES you can play with friends, the co-op game mode supports up to 4 players!

Title: Disney Tangled
description: Disney Tangled: The Video Game takes kids 6-11 on a film-inspired , hair-raising adventure. In this story-based journey kids will venture into a kingdom filled with colorful 3D environments , creative play, fun quests and competitive challenges.

Title: Ne no Kami - The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto Part 2
description: Kyoto is shrouded in silence. While the Ayakashi change course and prepare themselves for invasion, a sudden turn of events suddenly has Len drawing her sword against Shinonome. What brought upon this drastic course of events?

Title: Finnish Army Simulator
description: Military service, just like you remember it! Or if you don’t, you’ll feel like you do.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Early Access

Title: Victorian Admirals
description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models.

Title: Circularity
description: Relaxing puzzle with interesting game mechanics - bring your character to the final portal which will transit you to the next level. You will need to move straight, avoid obstacles, jump through portals, ricochet from walls and a lot more.

Title: Stellar Warfare
description: Space RTS with base building and ship customization. Personal passion project. More than 200 available ships, weapons and modules to design your fleet with. Contains a small campaign, several single and multiplayer game modes and a coop game mode. Also contains Wave defense!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Just Date
description: Just Date is a simulator of a real date, and it's up to you to determine how successful it will be. Share stories and jokes, treat yourself to delicious dishes, and try to win the heart of the beautiful girl, Elizabeth.

Title: Ping Pong Pufferfish
description: Aim precisely to get into the glass jar. Ping Pong Puffership is a challenging puzzle game in which you toss a ball until it hits the jar. The fewer balls you use, the more points you get!

Title: Wet Dreams
description: Wet Dreams is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Colors! Maze 2
description: Colors! Maze 2 is a minimalist casual game of easy mazes with relaxing music.

Title: BlockRunner : The BlockSide
description: Get through levels and fight some crazy bosses or just try to beat your high score in endless mode in this bullet hell type of a game! Stuff may happen or change when its least expected!

Title: STAR WARS™ Rebellion
description: It is a time of great upheaval. The first Death Star has been destroyed, marking a major victory for the Rebellion. But the Empire remains strong. As commander, you must choose to take control of either the Rebel Alliance or the Galactic Empire. Your goal: complete domination of the galaxy.

Title: Puzzle Car

Worse yet, the only person who can stop them is Zak McKracken, reporter for the disreputable National Inquisitor, who dreams up stories about carnivorous cantaloupes and vegetarian vampires.

Title: Mermaid Colony
description: Mermaid Colony is an atmospheric survival strategy game. You're granted godlike powers to guide the mermaids in a battle between light and darkness.

Title: 69 Cindy Love
description: 69 Cindy Love is a fun puzzle game. The game allows you to enjoy the everyday life situations of the beautiful young girl Cindy. Relaxing music and meditative gameplay will allow you to have a good rest after work.

Title: Cyber Utopia

Title: Tokyo Dark
description: Legend tells of a door deep below Tokyo's sewers. All who enter are lost forever. Detective Ito's partner is missing. Explore Tokyo & uncover the darkness that lays beneath the streets in this Point & Click - meets Visual Novel - narrative adventure that questions the very core of Ito's sanity.

Title: Otome No Himitsu
description: Otome No Himitsu is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Cthulhu Must Die
description: Hunt down Cthulhu in an action-roguelike bullethell. Choose characters, weapons, and upgrades for unique builds. Survive hordes of minions and finish Cthulhu before the final ritual ends, save humanity!

Title: Gone: Survival
description: Gone Survival is a first-person survival game for one player. Where you have many opportunities and a completely open world

Title: Battle Time
description: Take a role of a true general of a real army. Join the battle, capture enemies’ castles and raise the power of your army. Lead your clan to the victory!

Title: GirLand
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

Title: Lost Artifacts: Frozen Queen
description: Lost Artifacts: Frozen Queen – an exciting strategy game about adventures and archaeological discoveries. Save the world from a global ice age!

Title: Titan Outpost
description: Titan Outpost is a hard science fiction role-playing game in which you must build a base, manage its crew, develop your character's skills and attributes, and explore Saturn's sixth moon, uncovering its mysteries and harvesting its resources.​

Title: War Ender
description: War Ender is an action platformer where players assume the role of Red, known within the The City as "the greatest fighter." One night, Red was wandering the streets of The City when he found his friends dead.

Title: Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song- Remastered
description: Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song- returns as a stunning remastered edition, with new gameplay elements and quality of life features! Get ready for an even deeper story and an even more thrilling adventure!

Title: Lovely Archeologists
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

Title: Escape This
description: Escape This is a precision 3d platformer. Complete each of the random levels without touching any of the red blocks. It is possible to make your own levels

Title: US and THEM
description: “Us And Them - Cold War” is a turn-based strategy game about cold war that you can play either as CIA or KGB. Although it is a game of territorial expansion, the rivals do not attack their opponent using military force. Instead they are using an army of Spies, Assassins and Experts of various kinds (like economy, technology etc.

Title: Fruits Inc. Deluxe Pack
description: Embark on this journey and expand Fruits Inc.!

Title: Insert Paper
description: You don't know who or where you are. The papers are there and the computers are asking you to insert paper. Your job here is simple: find the documents considering the information required by the reader machines.

Title: Hellcoming
description: Hellcoming is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players, who need to clean large areas from hellish abomination with the help of special tools.

Title: Athena's Revenge

Title: Okinawa Rush
description: Take on the role of the martial arts master Hiro, Meilin, or Shin as they face off in a desperate fight for their lives against the Black Mantis clan. DOUBLE THE MAYHEM: Bring a friend and battle against ninjas, demons, and more in the 2-player local co-op mode of this action-adventure platformer.

Title: Strange Aeons
description: You are stuck in gnostic cyber-hell. The followers of your cult are summoning you. Chat with an AI through the microphone to escape hell and return to the land of the living.

Title: STAR WARS™ - X-Wing Special Edition

Title: Magdalena
description: The mind dissolves in the surrounding darkness like pain dissolves in wine. Remains of memories crumble and rapidly leak like sand through fingers. And only one name stuck in the throat filled with fear. Magdalena... Minutes feel like days while waiting for something to happen.

description: Knight of Turn is a board game where the brave knight, imprisoned by the monsters in the deep dungeon, must find freedom and free the kingdom from this threat.

Title: Victorian Admirals Panama Crisis 1885
description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models.

Title: The Future Radio and the Artificial Pigeons
description: 2061, Japan. Mankind has lost the sky, and with it, its connections. All of it was taken away by birds... ...By countless artificial pigeons flying through the sky.

Title: Digs

Manage your actions, customize your arsenal with upgrade cards, and explore diverse levels. Can you dig in and emerge victorious?

Title: Locked in my Darkness
description: Locked in my Darkness is a psychological horror game & horror atmosphere, which takes place in an apartment complex.

Title: Cthulhu tower
description: Cthulhu Tower is a dark twist on classical tower defense genre where you try to protect your eldrich world from cruel crowds of humans!

Title: Long Live The Queen
description: Rule the world or die trying!Being a Princess is not an easy job. Being a Queen is even harder. Especially when you're only fourteen years old, and the reason you've inherited the throne is that your royal mother has just met an untimely end.Now power is up for grabs.

Title: World of MiniMonsters
description: World of MiniMonsters is a game of collecting and leveling creatures where you will reach the glory fighting in fast-paced battles.

Title: Bai Qu: Hundreds of Melodies
description: A melody of life and death surrounding a sickly girl and her friends.

Title: DreamWorks Dragons: Legends of The Nine Realms
description: Unleash your inner dragon and fly beyond the Hidden World, on a fiery adventure to rescue Thunder’s family and save the dragon kingdoms!

Title: Princess's Peak
description: This is a puzzle game that incorporates guessing to get characters and interact with the characters. All characters are 18+ Beautiful Art Dynamic CGs 7 unique and different girls

Title: maze to the old castle
description: Journey through various types of hedges-mazes, forests, tree-mazes, mountains, cave-maze, castle ruins, amids natural life and see if thee can reach the old castle. Maze to the old castle seeks to a-maze, relax, challenge as a oldschool casual logic path-finding maze-solving game.

Title: Dark Nebula VR
description: Dark Nebula is a sci-fi VR shooter full of insane encounters and bloody kills.

Title: Kinkoi: Golden Loveriche
description: Kinkoi: Golden Loveriche is a Japanese-style visual novel produced by Saga Planets, a Japanese developer of romance VNs. The game won numerous awards in the year of its release in Japan for its art, music, characters, and story.

Title: Bottle Journey
description: it's a bottle, it can be very difficult! this game is very difficult, it is divided into several levels and each level will be more difficult and more difficult, but you can help overcome these difficulties!

Title: Captain of Industry

Become an industrial superpower! But this is no easy task, you will be put to the test to keep your settlement alive.

Title: 9-nine-:Episode 2

Title: Divine Divinity
description: Divine Divinity is an epic role-playing game with hack-and-slash action, offering a huge world to explore and thousands of items to investigate, trade and use.

Title: Love, Money, Rock'n'Roll

description: Experience Tiana’s exciting world set in the jazz-infused era of 1920’s New Orleans with the official The Princess and the Frog video game. Celebrate favorite moments from the movie and take on new challenges with Tiana, as she pursues her dreams in a fun adventure.

description: Tarakan is a puzzle mystery adventure, inspired by escape room style games. Take control of a submarine and visit multiple coastal laboratories. Solve puzzles as you go to unlock the tools you need to solve the mystery!

Title: Wrecked! Unfair Car Stunts
description: Car stunts game made by you as a kid in your imagination. Drawn and colored. And unfair.

Title: Craft The World

description: Shuuji and Kana have their hands full teaching Iroha how to be human again, after she spends ten years in the mountains with a wolf god. But who's really raising who?

Title: Doki Doki House

In this game you play as the heroine, which suddenly becomes the temporary owner of a guest house. Fall in love with these characters and experience the interesting story of your very own guest house!

Title: OnlyGame: Working Girls
description: Be a good boy and enjoy this puzzle game with sexy girls

Title: Godfist
description: Godfist is a single-player first person roguelike deck builder, where you have to punch enemies off the tower to progress. Your mission is to climb to the top of the tower and punch god in the face.

Title: The Adventures of LinShanHai - Chapter3:The Headless Woman
description: 本案是林山海探案集的第三案，有人报告一个废弃厂房最近恶臭难闻，有人发现房梁上挂着一具腐烂的尸体，系A市人民医院太平间丢失的女尸，尸体有被侵犯的痕迹，头被割去。警方调查毫无头绪。您将在多个案发地点进行搜证调查，破解这宗神秘的案件

Title: Kingdom Tales
description: Embark on a magical journey in this entertaining and fun time management strategy game! In Kingdom Tales you will explore the land, gather, produce and trade resources, build, repair and take care of your citizens.

Title: Terrarium Builder
description: Build as many terrariums as you like, enjoying lo-fi peaceful and relaxing music. Sculpt the terrain, choose plants and decorations, and finally take pictures to share with everyone.

Title: Caribbean Jigsaw
description: Caribbean Jigsaw - solve the puzzles of old pirate and find the treasure!

Title: Paper Ghost Stories: 7PM

"What's this...?" A single notebook had fallen right in front of me. "Hey, you! Yes, you! Why aren't you picking it up?"

genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: Battle Ram
description: Battle Ram - an experiment of scientists developed in a secret laboratory, a powerful creature against robots, who will win?

description: A mix between classic old school platforming with puzzles, gravity and construction thrown in.

description: Alicia is a female knight who has won many battles with her armor and sword. One day, a sorcerer she once let escape casts an curse of armor disablement on her. Now, only she can equip is a maid's uniform...

Take on your care robot and explore the underground, find new blueprints, gather resources and build your defenses and traps to survive through the night against a myriad of zombie-like creatures. Your goal: to defend the defenseless cradle.

Title: My Sweet Ants!
description: My Sweet Ants! is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Ants. The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: 5Rings
description: 5Rings is a rotary jigsaw puzzle game. 1.Tap the ring, let the ring rotate a certain angle to recover the target picture. 2.28 kinds of target pictures. 3.Support import any picture as target .

Title: Mahjong Solitaire
description: The classic version of the famous board game Mahjong Solitaire.

Title: Sweet Halloween
description: Sweet Halloween is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: 1942: The Pacific Air War

Title: Mythic Ocean
description: Teach the gods to create a better universe - or mess it all up in Mythic Ocean, a narrative exploration game where your choices shape the fate of the cosmos.

Title: Stories Untold

Title: HAELE 3D - Feet Poser Pro

As a romance visual novel game, this work uses the labels 'lie', 'moon' and 'tale of woe' throughout the main story. The love story between the heroine and the charming but sinful heroes is depicted.

Title: architect
description: Relax while building mind-bending structures and populating them with strange entities

description: Katy and Bob Way Back Home - help Katy and Bob to make the best cafe on the isle!

description: Otaku Club is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

description: Aquarium Sandbox is an aquarium simulator that allows you to learn, config, and share an underwater world.

Title: Victorian Admirals Samoan Crisis 1889
description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models.

description: Sokonashi No Me is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

description: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End invites players into the world of the films - and beyond. Live and die by the sword while playing as Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann.

description: HOO-BOY! A platformer game about the adventures of a candy boy hailing from Candy-Land.

In this epic, indie fantasy adventure, you are free to explore, fight for fame and power, and shape the world as you choose. Title: Spelunker Party!
