Embark on group expeditions in Offline and Online Co-op Multiplay with up to 4 players! Overcome thrilling challenges with Time Attack, Quests and more! Enjoy Spelunker Party together!

Title: Evergreen - Mountain Life Simulator
description: Evergreen is a simulation game about leaving the stress of the city behind and starting a new life in a mountain valley.

Title: Sleep
description: This has never been scarier. A story in which you will encounter unusual, strange places. Solve the mystery of this whole place and people who have lost their minds.

Title: Bricky to Me
description: Brick to Me puts you on a Puzzle Platform full of dynamically arranged rooms with a random path to the confrontation with “Space Mania”.

Title: God Of Gamblers
description: Participate in the God of Gamblers Tournament to compete for the Ring of God of Gamblers, date casino beauties, and whether you can gain intimacy is up to you.

Title: 3 Coins At School
description: 3 Coins at School is a turn-based game similar to soccer but played with coins on a desk.

Title: Hermitage: Strange Case Files
description: This gripping paranormal horror adventure revolves around Hermitage, the sinister bookstore that attracts most unusual customers – all of whom seem to be involved in mysterious cases bordering on the paranormal.

Title: The Cat Games
description: Do you like cats? Then this is the purrfect game for you!

Title: ResumeMaker® Professional Deluxe 20
description: Build a Professional Resume Fast! ResumeMaker’s step-by-step guide will help you create a professional resume that showcases your experience, skills and capabilities to apply for positions and share on social media networks to get a better job.

Title: Waifu Museum
description: Waifu Museum is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Crusade in Europe
description: Crusade in Europe is a classic real-time simulation game from the 80s designed by Sid Meier and Ed Bever. The first title in the "Command Series" of tactical wargames from Microprose, the game features real-time battles that test your skills as a commander.

Title: 69 Hitomi Love
description: 69 Hitomi Love is an addicting puzzle game in the jigsaw genre. The elven blood goddess Hitomi is waiting for you to collect all the puzzle pieces and unlock the graphic reward. Relaxing music and meditative gameplay will allow to have a good rest after work .

Title: BJORN
description: BJORN is an RPG platformer with a linear and dramatic storyline You have to save your family, which was kidnapped by the hero's evil brother. As you progress through the plot, you will learn the story of the enmity between the brothers.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: CARRION
description: CARRION is a reverse horror game in which you assume the role of an amorphous creature of unknown origins, stalking and consuming those that imprisoned you.

Title: Fleet Defender: The F-14 Tomcat Simulation
description: The catapult officer calls for full afterburner. 50,000 pounds of thrust spools behind you as your F-14 strains for release. Less than three seconds later your Tomcat screams through the air at 150 knots. You climb to meet your wingman, then head off to join the fight.

Title: Cloud Girl
description: Cloud Girl is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Ball of Wonder
description: Come with us to the magnicifent world of circuses.

Title: F-117A Nighthawk Stealth Fighter 2.0
description: Down below, the enemy sits unaware while a sleek, metallic creature slices through the dark. No blips show on the radar, no sign is given. Then, an instant, the roar of exploding ordnance shatters the night, demolishing targets, sending troops and pilots scrambling.

Title: Slashvival
description: A virus has spread worldwide and you are the only member of your family who is immune... Fight through daily hordes of mutants to provide the necessary resources to save your family!
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Umiro
description: Huey and Satura find themselves lost in the colorless world of Umiro with no memory of their past or how they arrived in this mysterious place. Draw your way through beautiful puzzles and guide Huey and Satura as they restore color to Umiro.

Title: Art of Destruction
description: A physics sandbox simulation game about constructing and demolishing structures. If you like destroying stuff or just mess around, then this game is for you!

Title: Murk
description: Your goal is to escape from this strange, hostile and really dark place. Don't be afraid of the dark, kill your enemies without mercy, cautiously avoid death traps, discover quirky secret places, and much more!

Title: Hostage: Rescue Mission
description: Special Alert: Terrorists have invaded our embassy and seized an undetermined number of hostages...Lives hang in the balance as high ranking diplomats are held at gunpoint...Their safety requires immediate action... prepare to infiltrate the embassy, neutralize the terrorists, and rescue the hostages, or die trying.

Title: Among School Girls
description: Among School Girls is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Ancestors Legacy
description: Ancestors Legacy is a squad-based real time strategy with a strong focus on tactics. Inspired by medieval European history, it brings to life four different nations and their conflicts, usually solved by war.

Title: NORN9
description: Friendship is never unbreakable. Love is never eternal. However, no man is an island.

Title: I Walk Among Zombies Vol. 2 (Adult Version)
description: Yuusuke and Mitsuki race to the town hall, but what they find there might not be everything they hoped for. Can Dr. Makiura save Mitsuki's little brother? Will the promised rescue ever come?

Title: This Is the Police
description: This Is the Police is a strategy/adventure game set in a city spiraling the drain. Taking the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, you'll dive into a deep story of crime and intrigue. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse?

Title: Hello Lady! - Complete Edition
description: It's the Dawn of a New Age- The 21st century has brought about its own slew of problems for society at large. Asa result, the most promising youths from around the world have been gathered and enrolled in Amakawa Noble Academy.

Title: Adventure Trip: London Collector's Edition
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

Title: Disney G-Force
description: G-Force draws you into the adventures of an elite team of trained guinea pigs on a mission to thwart a sinister plot to destroy the world. Take control of both G-Force commander Darwin and his sidekick, Mooch, as they apply their talents to defeat an evil army of altered household appliances.

Title: Dogs Cyberpuzzle
description: A jigsaw puzzle like you've never seen before! A jigsaw puzzle with videos of dogs! Unlock Kitty's Message to find out what's behind this unusual game.

Title: STAR WARS™ Battlefront (Classic, 2004)
description: Fight the greatest battles in the STAR WARS universe any way you want to. The choice is yours.

Title: Friendly Snowball
description: Friendly Snowball is a fun multiplayer PVP ball game to enjoy with friends.

Title: Aokana - Four Rhythms Across the Blue - EXTRA2
description: Aokana - EXTRA2 is the official Misaki after story for Aokana.

Title: East 73: Magenta Fairytale
description: Stunning visuals and a fantastical daily Nanjing story unfold. Xiao Su, who sees into others' hearts, joins a new school's art class. He encounters familiar and new faces, exploring their inner worlds and confronting his own hidden depths.

Title: ISEKAI QUEST
description: Welcome to the Isekai, world of cute Anime Girls! Isekai Quest! is a Moe-Puzzle RPG game. In this Harem World, the story between you and girls begins.

Title: Valentino Rossi The Game
description: The most complete MotoGP™ game ever! Join Valentino Rossi’s VR|46 Riders Academy and train with him in order to become the new champion of the 2016 MotoGP™ season!

Title: Flying Corps
description: The game is split in four campaigns: The Flying Circus (1917), Battle of Cambrai 1917, German spring offensive (1918) and Hat In The Ring (1918). Several airplanes are available, including the Sopwith Camel, the Nieuport 28 and the Fokker Dr.I

Title: Handyman Corporation
description: In Handyman Corporation you become the owner of a business where you handle a variety of jobs in cleaning, maintenance, design, and construction. Accept contracts, play minigames to perform every task required. Then expand your company – buy spare parts, tools, train skills, and manage employees

Title: Ecchi Spirit
description: Takeshi is a famous exorcist. He had heard about horrible forest spirits attacking people in a small village. Upon arrival, he found out that those spirits are only interested in young maidens... Ecchi Spirit is a point-and-click arcade game focused on erotic experience.

Title: ANIME WORLD
description: Immerse yourself in ANIME WORLD with impressive cel-shaded animations and look right into the soul of every character.

Title: Sugar * Style
description: Sugar * Style is a Japanese-style visual novel produced by Smee, a Japanese developer of romance VNs. Be the perfect husband for your future wife and conquer her heart with your husband-powers!

Title: Traditional Chinese Medicine Simulator
description: 《中医模拟器》是一款独特的个人制作游戏，风格和市面绝大多游戏不同，定位是帮助中医爱好者或学生更有兴趣和效率学习中医，并且帮助中医0基础玩家入门。 可以加群 494811550（学习群），697138589（已满），302219333（第2群已满），欢迎参加讨论。
genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Tales of Spark
description: "Tales of Spark" is a Hack & Slash Action RPG with an Eastern flair. Players assume the role of a young wandering swordsman, exploring the vast desert, seeking treasures, defeating powerful bosses, and even slaying gigantic celestial dragons.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: MicroCrawl
description: Microcrawl is a bite sized point and click 2D adventure text hybrid presented from the first person in which you'll have to navigate your way through a dark fantasy world anthology that includes three seperate stories.

Title: Loco-Sort
description: Loco-Sort is a puzzle-solving indie game, set in the railroads of the 1880s America. You control a small locomotive with the goal of assembling a train by sorting several numbered railroad cars across a maze of rail tracks and switches. 30 challenging levels, 9 playable locomotives and much more!

Title: Venba
description: Venba is a short narrative cooking game, where you play as an Indian mom, who immigrates to Canada with her family in the 1980s. Players will cook various dishes and restore lost recipes, hold branching conversations and explore in this story about family, love, loss and more.

Title: CoreOptimizer
description: CoreOptimizer improves your game playing performance through optimizing your computer's hardware resource.

Title: Grottesco Absurdus
description: Grottesco Absurdus is a bright transference crossover, absurd and chaotic. A vibrant mixture of childhood fantasies and fears becomes an unpredictable story. It's a fair deal! Join us!

Title: Jalopy
description: Build, repair, refuel and drive a dilapidated old car on a grand journey through the territories of the former Eastern bloc. Explore Germany, CSFR, Hungary, Yugoslavia and Bulgaria

Title: Follow Your Heart
description: Follow Your Heart is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Royal Defense
description: The castle needs a hero – hordes of trolls are surrounding it! Build towers, save money, learn spells - don't let the enemy in! Follow the exciting story of the dwarven kingdom's eternal struggle against the troll hordes, who want only to crush the dwarves and claim their territory.

Title: KITBASHERS UNITED
description: Bad Dudes are attacking Kitty City. Team Kitty has United to Bash the Bad Dudes. "KITBASHERS UNITED" is a fantastic 'JRPG inspired' game with a turn-based combat system.

Title: Murdered: Soul Suspect
description: MURDERED: SOUL SUSPECT™ takes players into a whole new realm of mystery where the case is personal and the clues just out of reach, challenging gamers to solve the hardest case of all… their own murder.

Title: Samplitude Music Studio 2019 Steam Edition
description: Everything you need for gaming soundtracks: With Samplitude Music Studio – Steam Edition, you're best equipped for every step of game sound production!

Title: Nekomimi Nikki
description: Nekomimi Nikki is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Into The Unknown
description: In a small city, a man was struggling to save his business from failure. Despite his best efforts, he was unable to find a solution. One day, while searching for a document in his room, he stumbled upon a dusty book that he had never seen before. The title of the book was “Into The Unknown”.

Title: Tank Hurricane
description: In Tank Hurricane you have to fight in a tank battle with AI, which will not let you get bored.

Title: Seven Horns From Tilt
description: Help Libby tilt through various obstacles in order for him to meet his parents on the other side.

Title: Elemental Adventure
description: Embark on an action packed adventure! Elemental Adventure is a fast paced build-oriented ARPG. Featuring 8 distinct classes each with 12 unique skills, all with their own progression trees. Craft powerful gems to further customize endless possible combinations and face the ultimate challenge!

Title: Moondrop
description: Moondrop is a cozy farming roguelite. Build a farm on a shifting mountain. Find treasure in its hidden trails. Use your skill at farming and alchemy to hold off the vanishing mists. When they inevitably arrive, retreat and rebuild the village to upgrade your next farm. Can you reach the summit?

Title: Last Days of Spring 2
description: It’s been five years since the Hayabusa Academy gang graduated from high school, Yuka has just graduated from University and moved to a new city when she receives an invitation from Aya, her best friend, for a class reunion in her country lodge in Cannon Beach, Oregon.

Title: Riddle Joker
description: For decades, superpowers and psychic abilities were thought to be mere science fiction, but the discovery of a certain particle called the "Astron" at the end of the 20th century proved to the world that these wondrous phenomena were real.

Title: Battleships: Command of the Sea
description: Take on the role of one of the historical commanders of the US or Japanese navy and use their special skills inspired by their character or military accomplishments.

Title: Mini Moves: Among Stars
description: Mini moves in the giant universe, simplicity is what you need to achieve your goals.

Title: Enchanted in the Moonlight - Miyabi, Kyoga & Samon -
description: You’re an average 25-year-old girl, working at the library to make ends meet and support your family’s shrine. However, that all changes when handsome men save you from malevolent spirits! It turns out, though, your saviors are more than they appear… They’re Ayakashi Spirits, too.

Title: Picture Builder
description: This is an artistic innovative puzzle. Build pixel pictures from blocks by stacking them on top of each other with partial overlap. (But for those who like to just relax, there are also modes of playing the classic mosaic.)

Title: Yes My Lord
description: The protagonist was once a famous genius, but now he is poor. One day, he woke up drunk and found himself in an underground cemetery with demons wandering around. The mysterious girl "Foxy" who met in the cemetery taught him the necromancer magic.

Title: You are the Judge!
description: As a judge of the Kobardde court, solve complex cases inspired by actual events. Your decisions will directly affect people's (and perhaps yours) lives. You may have to make difficult decisions for your family, country, and life. What kind of judge will you be?

Title: Path of Giants
description: Path of Giants is a serene puzzle adventure that follows three adorable explorers as they take on an icy mountain full of trials in search of a lost treasure. Control three characters, use their teamwork, leave no one behind, and hopefully find some gold!

Title: Art of Beauties
description: This is the puzzle with a several levels of difficulty and beautiful artbook. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.

Title: Endless Road: Reborn
description: Endless Road: Reborn is a roguelike card game published by Sula Box Games where players use a variety of equipment & skills to defeat vile creatures lurking along a treacherous, endless road. Players will also be faced with choices that will test their decision-making abilities and survival skills.

Title: Calcium Contract
description: Calcium Contract is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you're on a mission to finish a contract that got out of hand. Learn to swiftly move around your enemies and master your arsenal as you fight your way toward the grand finale.

Title: Wild Wild Chess
description: The classical game of chess... now played in the Wild West! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be the wildest gunslinger in the old west!

Title: Alice's Patchwork
description: Assemble patchwork mosaics while you travel with Alice and the famous characters of Wonderland and Looking-Glass Land

Title: Severed Steel
description: An intense single-player FPS featuring a stylish movement system, completely destructible levels, and an acclaimed OST.

Title: 69 Summon Succubus
description: 69 Summon Sucubus - is a game in which you take on the role of a succubus trainer.You have become the owner of a magic book that allows you to summon the succubus Lilith. You need to choose skills for training and complete tasks. After each workout, your succubus will get stronger.

Title: Wet Cute Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

Title: RIOT: Civil Unrest
description: As civil crisis deepens and inequality tears the very fabric of society the discontentment of the masses manifests itself in violent public disturbances and civil disorder. Play as the police or the angry horde as RIOT – Civil Unrest places you in some of the world’s most fractious disputes.

Title: MY ANIMA BOY
description: A short visual novel depicting the struggles and romantic entanglements of a composer attempting to write lyrics for the first time in his life. It's a BL (Boys' Love) story.

Title: The Legend of Crystal Valley
description: The Legend of Crystal Valley is an indie point n' click adventure game, based on story and exploration, set between the two worlds where reality, fantasy and science fiction collide.

Title: Psychoscopy
description: Psychoscopy is a 5 player co-op horror game that you try to gather evidences about paranormal activities in large areas. Make a team with your 4 friends, take your equipments and hunt down paranormal activities.

Title: 9-nine-:Episode 4
description: Kakeru and his friends uncover the identity of the mastermind behind the incidents in Shiromitsugawa as the story shifts to focus on Noa Yuuki, a girl with a strong sense of justice. What secrets will they uncover about the Artifacts and the bonds that ties them all together?

Title: Mother Simulator
description: It’s a humorous project about a young parent's difficult weekdays. If you feel worried, irritated, you don’t understand what’s going on and what you must do next, so don’t worry. We want to give you exactly these feelings in our game.

Title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Monsters Overboard
description: Dracula, Mavis and their monster friends are marooned on the mysterious Lost Islands – and only you, in command of lovable little creatures, the Impa, can save them! Explore the islands, discover new Impa abilities, and rescue Frankenstein, Murray and Wayne from fearsome enemies. But hurry – the Drac-Pack’s lives are at stake!

Title: Voodoo Whisperer Curse of a Legend
description: The entire town has been put into a deep, dark sleep by a mysterious evil force. Now young Lillian must find allies and uncover the dark secrets of voodoo in order to save her master and free her friends before it is too late.

Title: Dust and Salt: The Battle for Murk
description: The Battle for Murk is an interactive narrative set in a gritty medieval world. Play as Corporal Mandrake from the City Watch in a fantasy adventure game. Uncover the truth behind a treacherous conspiracy in a race against time to save your hometown from falling into the hands of a cruel barbaric leader.

Title: Love Tavern
description: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different girls from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Black Gunner Wukong
description: Black Gunner Wukong is a TPS+ROGUE game where players will take on the role of Sun Wukong, using three heads, six arms, and six big guns to rampage through the US military base and rescue their master.

Title: Zompiercer
description: Take control of the train which will become your haven on the rails. Collect resources, craft equipment, construct a cozy house on railway cars, and travel through the carefully handcrafted locations to explore the story of a zombie apocalypse world.

Title: Forgotten Sound 1: Revelation
description: “Music is the melody of life”. Prince Shahbaz remembers hearing this sentence constantly from his mother. Following her death, Shahrdad Shah, his father, had forbidden playing all instruments as he couldn’t bear the memory of his beloved wife that accompanied the music.

Title: Ken ga Kimi
description: Love story with samurais living in Japan This is a splendid Japanese adventure game which its story is happened in "The Land of the Rising Sun" where human, Yōkai and Oni were living together. Will your story end in the tragedy of "Ken(sword)", or the romance of "Kimi(you)"？

Title: Royal Booty Quest
description: Dive into the world of Royal Booty Quest and experience the thrill of deckbuilding and roguelike adventure like never before.

Title: KAOS SurVival
description: KAOS SurVival is a survival game in an open world, where the player can explore and find items that will make his life easier. The player can build a shelter or a large fortress to keep his possessions and defend himself from other players.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Strategy

Title: Questerium: Sinister Trinity HD Collector's Edition
description: Financed by the banker, the professor builds an evil machine that causes the meteor’s energy to spin out of control, destroying the city and mutating its plants and animals. Citizens are evacuated, but rescuers fail to find and evacuate two children.

Title: Diego: Mission Red Tomato
description: Diego: Mission Red Tomatoes is a humorous game where you have to shoot the tomatoes.

Title: Transient: Extended Edition
description: H.P. Lovecraft meets Cyberpunk. Delve deep into a dystopian world and investigate what is happening to you and your friends in a domed city. Solve puzzles, hack systems and plug in to explore other dimensions. Discover a truth that might tear apart your sanity and question your very existence.

Title: Give Me Your Coins
description: Give Me Your Coins is a fast-paced platformer built on precision and momentum. Try to get out of the magic chest, go through the several dozen levels created inside his wooden body.

Title: Kiiroi Hana
description: Kiiroi Hana is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Gem Rifts
description: Ancient portals have been lying dormant, waiting for daring adventurers to travel between worlds. Your task is to lead an expedition through one of these portals, research and build defenses around it, and protect it from hostile guardian life forms.

Title: Thermonuclear
description: Unleash the power of Thermonuclear, the ultimate cyborg machine, in this thrilling sci-fi roguelite turn-based strategy game. Outsmart enemy AI and end the war with procedurally generated levels and upgrades for your base and Thermonuclear. Can you emerge victorious?

Title: Divinity: Dragon Commander
description: You are the Dragon Commander. Your mission it is to reunite a broken empire and become the new emperor. Success depends entirely on your ability to efficiently rule your empire, build invincible armies and lead them to victory.

Title: 69 Penny Hot
description: 69 Penny Hot - is a game that contains novel and memory puzzle elements. You decided to drink a cup of hot coffee and met the pretty barista Lady Penny.

Title: Slobbish Dragon Princess 2
description: Takeru and Haru's life of slacc is upended once more as Iris, dragon queen of the Sea and Water factions shows up on Earth to claim the seas and bar all humans from entering them. Hijinks and plenty of dragon girls await in Slobbish Dragon Princess 2!

Title: Timore Redo
description: Timore Redo is a psychological horror game about sadness.

Title: From Heaven To Earth
description: In this game, you follow an eternal being who got bored in heaven and tries to make their way back into the world of the living. To return to earth it has to pass the path of trials... a path filled with traps, difficult jumps, and hidden secrets. A unique philosophical platformer awaits you.

Title: 69 Berta Hot
description: 69 Berta Hot - Puzzle with visual novel elements. Your maid Berta was caught stealing and now it's easy for her to make amends with you. Don't miss the opportunity to see all her hidden talents.

Title: Merchant's Game
description: Merchant's Game is a 2D pixelart open-ended game that you hire npc's, negotiate prices, sell and buy items to pay your debt to the lanlord and maintaining your shop.

Title: Little Goody Two Shoes
description: Venture into the woods as you play Little Goody Two Shoes, a phantasmagorical horror narrative adventure where all your decisions matter!

Title: Shapelab
description: Shapelab by Leopoly is a VR design application offering a variety of powerful polygon mesh-based sculpting tools, for both aspiring creatives and experienced 3D artists. Step into our virtual lab and release your creativity, make your own models, and perfect your ideas through digital sculpting!

Title: Panzer Panic VR
description: Battle your friends in an action-packed tank VR multiplayer game!

Title: Flashing Lights - Police, Firefighting, Emergency Services (EMS) Simulator
description: Play solo or in up to 10-player multiplayer co-op! Flashing Lights is an open world police, firefighting and EMS simulator game with plenty of opportunity for role-play or more relaxed fun with friends. Become the law or save lives! Discover leagues of player-created mods!
genre: Action, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation

Title: Delude - Succubus Prison
description: The game has a seal for people over 18 years old. DELUDE is Studio Halissoni newest work. DELUDE is a game with an engaging and mysterious story. In this game you are in the shoes of Luiz D and need to find the exit of the succubus prison.

Title: 69 Andariel Hot
description: 69 Andariel Hot - Puzzle with visual novel elements in fantasy style. Dear elf Andariel is waiting for you in the "House of Flowers". Play a game with her and in case of victory she will fulfill your cherished desires.

Title: Lost Artifacts: Golden Island
description: Lost Artifacts Golden Island is an exciting strategy game about the world of Atlantis. Restore Atlantis and defeat the villain!

Title: WORLD OF FINAL FANTASY®
description: CAPTURE, CUSTOMISE AND EVOLVE! Embark on a magical journey with siblings Reynn and Lann as they explore the vast land of Grymoire to rediscover their past and save the future.

Title: GEESE vs CTHULHU
description: GEESE vs CTHULHU - a colorful and dynamic story about the magical Geese and the evil Cthulhu. Incredible heroes and unpredictable adventures await you! Play for the three-headed Super Drake! Fight against huge bosses while listening to drive music! Remember that the Geese are watching you...

Title: Super Retro Retry
description: 100 levels, some are easy, some not, sometimes flipped horizontally, sometimes flipped vertically, always randomized! And ONE SINGLE LIFE. Customize your experience. Are you ready for the ultimate Retro challenge? Are you ready for Retry?

Title: Strayed Lights
description: An atmospheric action adventure combining a wordless experience with cinematic fights based around colors. Restore your light that was torn by shadows and face endearing creatures deformed by their emotions.

Title: TRATRITLE
description: A little master lived happily with his maids. But what bothered him was that the maids were too naive and simple. One day, he received a letter from his father. He thought he could solve the current problem... But unexpectedly, another succubus maid came. Will he still be a good boy or...?

Title: Elven Rivers 2: New Horizons Collector's Edition
description: Celene and her brave teammates have already earn a reputation for themselves: this is why they were chosen to be the first group to explore the neighbouring continent of beastmen.

Title: Strawhart
description: Start a cult and resurrect an ancient evil in Strawhart, an irresponsible action-puzzler filled with things looking to kill you.

Title: Virtual Pool 4
description: Play 8-Ball, 9-Ball, Snooker, Billiards, Pub Pool, 27 games total! “So realistic it will make your real life pool game better!”Two career play modes, trick shots, video tutorials, multi-player online. Virtual Pool 4 is the most comprehensive cue sport game ever!

Title: Superliminal
description: Perception is reality. In this mind-bending first-person puzzler, you escape a surreal dream world through solving impossible puzzles using the ambiguity of depth and perspective.

Title: Unlimited Escape 3 & 4 Double Pack
description: Two new versions of Unlimited Escape in one bundle! Twice the fun, and tons of new features!

Title: Evil Wizard
description: Evil Wizard is a humor-filled action RPG that puts you in the shoes of a former Final Boss. Rise from defeat, rediscover long lost powers, and fight to reclaim your castle from an army of so-called heroes.

Title: Alice's Jigsaw. Wonderland Chronicles 2
description: See Alice and her friends! Solve 120 unique patchwork mosaics!

Title: Desert of Vice
description: A narrative based horror text adventure game with choice dependent multiple endings.

Title: Attack at Dawn: North Africa
description: Attack at Dawn is a WWII strategy game that mixes the ease of real-time action with the depth of operational gameplay, all on beautifully crafted North Africa maps. Plan your strategy like Rommel or Montgomery and better the real history.

Title: Detective Rosie Morgan: Murder on the River Thames
description: “Detective Rosie Morgan: Murder on the River Thames” is a Detective Mystery Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim set in London. You play as DI (Detective Inspector) Rosie Morgan, one of the best and brightest detectives in London's Metropolitan Police.

Title: Fisherman's House
description: You have been kidnapped, and you don't know why and where you are. All you know is that you have to escape from this place before the fisherman kills you. In this house, you will find some items and puzzles that will help you escape from this house. Will you survive or get killed by the fisherman?

Title: Torn
description: Torn is a dark science-fiction mystery. Explore the abandoned mansion of Dr. Lawrence Talbot, an eccentric scientist missing for 64 years. Use the Gravity Tool to activate Talbot’s machines, then transport to the strange dimension known as “The Parallel.”

Title: Cursed House 10 - Match 3 Puzzle
description: Solve tricky Match3 levels, play bonus games and lift the curse!

Title: Super Grappling Gecko
description: Swing over spikes and pits, find the secrets of a mysterious tree and overcome difficult challenges as a brave tiny lizard in this small adventure.

Title: Alice in Wonderland - Hidden Objects
description: A great classic fully revised to live a wonderful adventure!

Title: Back Then
description: Back Then is a first-person narrative game taking place in the mind of Thomas Eilian, an elderly writer diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.

Title: Shan Gui II: Sweet Osmanthus II
description: Autumn goes by, girls are still waiting till osmanthus blooming.

Title: My Dangerous Life
description: Hinata has only just arrived in New York, but things are already going downhill. Then a handsome stranger offers his help, and suddenly Hinata finds himself in a shared apartment with three hot guys. A rollercoaster of emotions begins.

Title: Lifesigns
description: The past was haunting — and so, you fled. To the deep web of streets, blinding lights, skyscrapers, creature comforts, a whole new life, a whole new you. Welcome to the City. Welcome to the Corporation. Welcome to the Game.

Title: A Dream For Aaron
description: A Dream For Aaron is a first person shooter with a huge replay value.

Title: Secrets of the Witch House
description: Secrets of the Witch House is a challenging, procedurally generated, permadeath, action roguelike. Encounter fierce monsters, dark secrets, devastating weapons and pachinko as you wage war against an ancient evil.

Title: Potatoman Seeks the Troof
description: Potatoman will put your reflexes and worldview to the test as you journey through scorching deserts, dark forests, busy cities, the tallest mountains and eventually your own potato-consciousness in search of the ultimate answer. Are you prepared to face the TROOF?

Title: Morrow
description: Morrow is a fast paced, post-apocalyptic time survival RPG that will stress your real-time decision making abilities. Explore the vast kingdom’s ruins, reclaim lost and powerful artifacts, and gain strengthened abilities to fight off the hordes of monsters and creatures scouring the plagued lands.

Title: STAR WARS™ Episode I Racer
description: Two Engines. One Champion. No Limits.

Title: Metamorphosis
description: Play as Gregor, turned into a tiny bug, and set out on an extraordinary journey to unravel the mystery of your transformation. Metamorphosis is a first person adventure set in a surrealist world where your newfound abilities are your last and only hope for redemption.

Title: Spider
description: Spider is a unique puzzle game that puts players in the role of a brave spider, exploring a variety of stunning environments and overcoming challenges. Players need to use the spider's special abilities and intelligence to solve puzzles and complete the objectives of each level.

Title: Cars and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

Title: ELDR  LEGACY
description: 《ELDR LEGACY》 is a magical dark dungeon adventure game with a little Crewe style. The player uses all kinds of weapons and magic to destroy the enemy in a castle full of strange, firepower

Title: Delicious Donut
description: Donut puzzles. Very. Delicious.

Title: Pieces of Beauty 3
description: Deemed a Master of the Chinese Bird and Flower Painting Style, Ohara Koson produced hundreds of prints during his life. Discover 14 majestic pieces made by one of Japan's most celebrated artists while you sharpen your brain and relieve stress playing this Jigsaw Puzzle Game.

Title: Jet Fighters with Friends  (Multiplayer)
description: Single Player OR Multiplayer Jet Fighter Game with OR without A.I. Bots.

Title: Hotel Transylvania: Scary-Tale Adventures
description: Explore classic fairy tales worlds with your favorite characters from the Sony Pictures Animation films in Hotel Transylvania: Scary-Tale Adventures

Title: Secret of a Dream
description: The secret of a dream is a blend of click adventure & first person puzzle game. You play as a young man named Peter, He does not know where he is...

Title: FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE
description: Cloud Strife, an ex-SOLDIER operative, descends on the mako-powered city of Midgar. The world of the timeless classic FINAL FANTASY VII is reborn, using cutting-edge graphics technology, a new battle system and an additional adventure featuring Yuffie Kisaragi.

Title: My So-called Future Girlfriend
description: This game is a male-oriented visual novel that features text, illustration, and voice.

Title: Fill and Cross World Contest
description: Guess all the pictures and win the world contest! Solve 120 unique puzzles in 6 elegant locations in the most prestigious casino.

Title: Escape First 2
description: "Escape First 2" is the second installment of a multiplayer escape room puzzle game for virtual reality or desktop PC! It includes 3 different escape rooms to choose from and can be played competitively, co-op or solo.

Title: Armello
description: Armello is a grim fairy-tale board game come to life, with every match combining deep, tactical card play, rich tabletop strategy and RPG elements. Leverage subterfuge, spells and careful strategy to wrangle control of the game's chaotic odds as you quest for the throne.

Title: Galaxy Champions TV
description: Galaxy Champions TV is a super intense top-down closed arena shooter game inspired by the classic arcade game Smash TV. Get powerful weapons and power-ups, kill huge amounts of enemies, level up, unlock upgrades and beat all the bosses to become the champion of the most violent TV show of all time!

Title: Whitehaven
description: Uncover the mysteries of Whitehaven Orphanage in this first-person psychological horror game. Explore the place, collect clues and put the pieces together to find out what happened years ago as you delve deep into your mind.

Title: Champs TD
description: Champs TD is a typical Tower Defense Game as you know and like. Slay thousands of Minions in randomized Waves. Summon powerful Champions with 28+ unique Abilities. Earn Experience, Level Up and choose from 100+ Talents to improve your Champs just the way you want.

Title: Space Company Simulator
description: Take the position of a CEO of a space transport company and become a new major player in the industry. Space Company Simulator is a realistic management sim game that will challenge your planning skills as you strive to launch the first manned mission to Mars.

Title: Fear Effect Sedna
description: Thrilling action and stealth gameplay enhanced by the Fear system, an exciting story and ultra-stylish cutscenes. Harness your team’s dynamic abilities to tackle enemies and puzzles like never before.

Title: God of War
description: His vengeance against the Gods of Olympus years behind him, Kratos now lives as a man in the realm of Norse Gods and monsters. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to survive… and teach his son to do the same.

Title: Wuxia Master
description: Wuxia Master is a relaxed SLG game, which focused on character development, thought-provoking story plotline, and smooth fighting. As new valiant warrior, players will prepare for the World’s Wuxia contest held by the royal court to win the glorious title of Wuxia Master.
Publisher: 甲山林娛樂股份有限公司

Title: The Beat: A Glam Noir Game
description: In The Beat you take on the role of Leo, a closeted cop investigating a murder in the gay community. Each choice you make has a meaningful effect on the story and the more drama you create the higher your score.

Title: Ash of Gods: Redemption
description: Ash of Gods: Redemption is a turn-based RPG that combines tactical combat, CCG elements, and a constantly evolving story in which no one is safe from death, including the main characters.

Title: VR Waifu - MuChan
description: Not frustrating control, Not long tutorial, Not lost Willy anywhere. Because Willy is in your hands..."VR Waifu" is easy to play!

Title: Don't Be Afraid
description: Don't Be Afraid is an adventure horror game, that allows you to personate a boy, kidnapped by a psychopath. You have to survive, escape and find out how you were kidnapped. Exploring the gigantic, mysterious house of your torturer, you will soon reveal many secrets, hidden inside it’s walls…

Title: Law of Dispute
description: "The Law of Dispute" is a medieval realistic style auto chess + card type roguelike strategy game, building a deck of light strategy auto chess card battles on a 3 * 2 battlefield and achieving the final victory!

Title: Train Games
description: Join our protagonist, a passenger without a ticket, on an exciting train adventure. You will have to be smart and cunning while traveling. Can you outsmart the conductor and passengers to continue your journey, or will you be thrown off the train? The choice is yours.

Title: Escape First 3
description: "Escape First 3" is the third installment of a multiplayer escape room puzzle game for virtual reality or desktop PC! It includes 3 different escape rooms to choose from and can be played competitively, co-op or solo.

Title: Find your way
description: "Find Your Way" is an immersive Wild West third-person shooter. Become a determined sheriff, seek revenge on Jesse James' gang, and restore peace to Syver City. Engage in tactical battles and explore the atmospheric world in this thrilling odyssey.

description: Mixx Island: Remix Vol. 2 is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty! This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame!

Title: Cook OL
description: An OL dressed in uniform pantyhose and high heels, returned to the rental room after a day's work and prepared a delicate dinner for herself. As she waits for her food to heat up, she stretches, presses her legs and wiggles her toes, as if waiting for her food to cook faster.

Title: CARDMON
description: CARDMON is a new adventure inspired in old monster-catching games. Jump in and explore the TOJO region while trying to catch all the Cardmon. Defeat every carder and become the Regional Cardmaster in this aestethic world!

Title: Timore 6
description: Timore 6 is an indie horror game about facing your inner demons in order to save your child.

Title: Curious Cases
description: For Desktop or VR! In this 3 chapter story, you play as a modern day legend, Detective Thomas Moore. He has solved more cases than one can count, where others hit dead-ends, he gets to work.

Title: NEO Scavenger

description: I'm a cowboy: Western Shooter is a dynamic Top-Down Shooter with roguelike elements. Grab your revolver, spur your horse and prove to all the thugs that you are the best shooter in the entire Wild West!

Title: SpaceWorm
description: SpaceWorm is a casual retro game where you eat stars, planets and kill space-bugs.

Title: Gamble Tower
description: Embark on a high-stakes journey in our roguelite deckbuilder! A place where every decision is a gamble, risk and reward intertwine to shape your odds. Delve into a dark fantasy world brought to life through mesmerizing 2D hand-painted art, where wacky characters and unpredictable challenges await.

Title: Project LUX
description: The crime... is murder. Our story takes place in a court trial, set in a futuristic world where most humans have cyberbrains. The defendant on trial is an agent who coordinates with artists to create the data for cyberbrains to interact with people’s emotions. The victim is a girl artist named Lux.

Title: Touch Some Grass
description: Someone told me to go touch some grass. I'm pretty sure this is what they meant.

Title: Sokocat - Dungeon
description: Kitten Jone enters a mysterious castle looking for artifacts, solving Sokoban-style puzzles and keep away from the dungeon traps. Can you help the Kitten Jone in this adventure?

Title: Paquerette Down the Bunburrows

Title: Avernus

Title: Dr Livingstone, I Presume? Reversed Escape Room

Title: WAGAMAMA HIGH SPEC
description: Narumi Kouki, our hapless protagonist, writes a risque romcom for a weekly manga magazine. Due to its content, he's kept it a secret from everyone except the two closest to him: Mihiro and Toa.

Title: Erophone:Re

genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Combat Troops VR
description: Combat Troops VR is a dynamic military shooter game that will put your coordination, teamwork, and survival skills to the test. Whether you're taking on the enemy alone or working with your team, every mission is a thrilling challenge that requires quick thinking, precision, and skill.
genre: Action, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Medieval Fantasy Survival Simulator 2: Gladiator Edition
description: You're gonna get yourself killed in there... There's beasts, warriors, and much, much worse in the coliseum... Do you really think you've got what it takes to survive? Or do you think you're cut out for much more than that... There's only one way to find out, and time is of the essence!

Title: Sea of memories
description: Optical illusions reach Virtual Reality! Challenge your mind rotating the pieces to clean up the chaos.

Title: Polar Penguin
description: Help the lost penguin find his way home to his family. Magnetize your way through obstacles along the journey and avoid possible dangers on your path. This game is a short physics based platformer using magnets to traverse yourself and your surroundings.

Title: Re.poly
description: Build on what was once and defend it with your life. Survive the wild and defeat the evil, alone or with friends in a wonderful poly world.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Psi Project
description: Psi Project is a hardcore 2D shooter with elements of horror. The main character wakes up in an unknown place. Absolutely remembers nothing. Who he is and how he got here. Throughout search of answers he is strongly plagued by different kinds of hallucinations.

Title: Ballz: Farm

Players experience all the memorable scenes from all four films in the humorous and quirky LEGO Video Games style.

Title: Negligee: Girls Night

description: Fight against an army of elemental creatures hell bent on your destruction. Compete with other players on the leaderboards to show who is the master of Repetendium !

Title: Deathly Storm: The Edge of Life

But Sophie is quite a wildcat so who knows where such a date could lead in this yuri/lesbian themed visual novel with multiple routes and endings.

Title: Invasion
description: We want you to experience the dreadful emptiness of space and the tension of the obscurity of aliens.

Title: FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2

description: In Mia's Hunt, you plunge headfirst into the heart of darkness, a dense, zombie-infested world where survival is a moment-to-moment struggle. As the 21-year-old Mia, your every step could mean the difference between life and death.

description: You have to find the exit without losing your sanity through fighting the monsters behind the locked doors...

description: In a world where flying through the sky is as simple as riding a bicycle, the sport "Flying Circus" is all the rage. Following the discovery of anti-gravitons, special shoes that allow an individual to fly, Anti-Graviton Shoes, took the world by storm.

In Dungeon Siege II, the sequel to the best-selling RPG from Gas Powered Games, you will be called on to again wield sword and spell to save the world from a growing abomination many years in the making.

Title: Government Simulator

Title: WTF
description: WTF is a chaotic first person shooter that confronts heavily armed players with "The Devil" himself.

Title: Geometry Survivor [0]
description: Geometry Survivor is a survival rogue-lite game, where you fight with waves of shapes and trying to find a way from madness.It might be difficult, but also [DATA LOSS]

Title: Bartender VR Simulator
description: Step behind the virtual bar and flair your way to the stars! Enter the exciting world of bartending and master the art of dazzling mixology in VR with the help of 6-time Bartending world champion Tomasz Malek.

Title: Kawaii Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

Title: The Neverland of the Mountain and Sea
description: Falling in love!! With a robot girl (fool)!!

Title: Rosy Manga
description: Rosy Manga is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Loofy

description: Help Sam and Crystal and their family to find a new home in this time management strategy game! Explore, guide the tribe, build, gather resources, overcome obstacles and enjoy the tale of family, friendship and courage!

Title: Hopper Rabbit
description: Hop on to the epic open world of Hopper Rabbit with various adventures between quests. Find your way through the breath taking platforms to your queen.

Title: Hunteroids
description: Our cities are being attacked by meteorites & you are the only one able to protect us! However, your weapon can only destroy one type of meteorite... Create bubbles in the sky & transform all meteorites until they have the right shape, colour & rotation before exploding!

description: "Danko and the mystery of the jungle" - the action takes place in abandoned catacombs, where once an alien civilization mined crystals. Using antigravity, a magnet and other devices, Danko will find all the treasures and save his friends.

Title: Nether Nightmare
description: In Nether Nightmare you will be immersed in the void. Each cycle, each step taken will lead you to ...

Title: Disney Fairies: Tinker Bell's Adventure
description: Play as Tinker Bell, Iridessa, Silvermist, Fawn and Rosetta as you take on this exciting adventure. Fans will be able to enter a world inhabited by these magical characters and discover the secrets of Pixie Hollow.

Title: SokoMatch: Lizard Saga
description: In this game, you will help Lizzy, a lovable Lizard, to match 3 or more gems of the same collor in order to solve the puzzles and clear the stages! Are you ready? Solve!

description: Grab your favorite car, tune it, challenge players in Online Drift battles and become a DRIFT KING!

description: In My Little Dog Adventure you play as a little dog that discovers the world on its mission to find its way back home. It's a short emotional story-driven exploration game that will keep you interested with an immersive story and lovable characters.

Title: Tornado Driver
description: Endless runner game with different environments and objects being randomly generated.

Title: Geeksos
description: Survive in a city controlled by a game corporation. Residents have to buy DLC for every unfinished product, developers are forced to make endless sequels, and lootboxes are now sold even at the grocery store. Stop the madness or join it in the cybernetic stealth-shooter Geeksos.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Sid Meier's Covert Action (Classic)
description: Sid Meier's Covert Action - A Techno-Thriller From the Case Files of Max Remington.

Title: Miracle Snack Shop
description: Try to find love while managing a Korean snack shop.

Title: Superflight
description: Superflight is an intense, easy to learn wingsuit game with an infinite number of beautiful procedurally generated maps. A great game to relax for half an hour and chase your latest highscore!

Title: Defend from Candyland!
description: Embark on an epic tower defense journey against the relentless candy onslaught. Strategize, upgrade, and conquer in this challenging pixel art adventure. Are you ready for the sweet challenge that awaits?

Title: BALAN WONDERWORLD
description: Welcome to BALAN WONDERWORLD—a wondrous all-action show, the likes of which has never been seen before! Over 80 different costumes give you all the action that you could possibly imagine!

Title: Winter Polaris
description: A mysterious global pandemic is making people disappear into thin air. A mysterious glass object carried by a girl found adrift at sea. Two stories that set two pairs of protagonists off on separate journeys around the world. What does it mean to live, make mistakes, and live again?

Title: Foreign
description: Foreign - open-world, third-person, story-driven-game where relationship matters.

Title: Epitasis
description: After discovering an ancient portal, you suddenly find yourself among the remnants of an ancient alien civilization. Technological relics, sprawling ruins, and cryptic puzzles are all that remain. If you are to learn their secrets, you must unearth the fate of the race that called this world home.

Title: Negligee: Spring Clean
description: The girls of the Lingerie shop are back and they are in for their toughest day of the year, a mega sale event! How will the girls handle things, you get to decide not only how the sale goes but who you will control in this adult yuri/lesbian themed multi-routed visual novel game.

Title: Negligee: Love Stories
description: A series of four stories following the characters Karen, Charlotte, Sophie and Jasmin in their early lives as they have to choose what they really love and what path their lives will take.

Title: All-In-One Summer Sports VR
description: 10 Summer Sports are waiting for you! Head to a hot tropical island full of sunshine, fun and unforgettable experiences. Create your own character and join the dizzying games with many players around the world! Hone your skills, play and win!
genre: Action, Casual, Simulation, Sports, Early Access

Title: DIKDIK Video Kit 2024
description: DIKDIK Video Kit 2024 - The software is an easy video creation, batch video editing, screen recording and Auto subtitle software. It can add video, audio, image, subtitle in WYSIWYG. It can add watermark and subtitle to videos in batch, splitting and merging video in batch, screen recording, etc.

Title: Daardoa
description: Atmospheric and surreal horror game about day and night cycle.

Title: Dust and Salt
description: Dust and Salt is a text-based narrative adventure with a pinch of turn-based tactical battles which has you as the main hero leading your troops in a gritty, low-power, medieval fantasy world. You decide where to go and whom to form alliances with. Force your will with either diplomacy or through war.

Title: Colored Effects

Title: Victorian Admirals Caroline Crisis 1885
description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models.

Title: Songs of Armageddopolis
description: A point'n'click detective game where death is irreversible, intuition is more important than logic, and the main evidence is you.

Title: System of Souls
description: SoS is a puzzle and first-person platform game, where you play as L-064N, who wakes up in The ION laboratory, place where you will have to go through different logical trials created by the artificial intelligence of the place, in order to recover memories and understand this enigmatic world.

Title: Candy Maid
description: Candy Maid is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

Title: Straimium Immortaly
description: Straimium Immortaly is a shmup roguelike dungeoncrawler. Explore the butts-hard procedurally generated Cubicus battling beasties, looting endless item and weapon upgrades and defeating huge boss meanies in your vengeful quest to eradicate the Queeni Emperess.

Title: The Line TD
description: In The Line TD, you decide your path and you survive! Plan your strategy, carve your own path, choose your difficulty and survive the longest!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Slide Stories: Bonds & Memories
description: Follow a beautiful romantic story about an inseparable bond of a young couple in this relaxing and minimalist sliding puzzle game.

Title: I WANT TO DIE
description: The main character of the game, named David, goes in search of his missing daughter in a dark and ominous forest. He drives his car along a forest road, immersed in grief and despair. But on the way to his goal, his life turns into a nightmare.

Title: Clicker: Mining Simulator
description: In this game you will have an exciting immersion in the world of mining. You can earn the crypto currency and after selling it, follow the exchange rates, choose the currency that you like more and buy equipment to improve your farm.

Title: DS Epoch
description: In 2048 AD, An AI calling itself DS issued a notice to all mankind: that human society is temporarily taken over by AI. All intelligent weapons are controlled by AI, the armies of all countries are defeated by AI, and only a few resistance forces remain on the earth.

Title: Find a way out: Abode of darkness.
description: A game in the genre: First Person Shooter, RPG, Puzzle. You'll have to walk around the building to get essential items. Also you have to save battery charge because it runs out very fast. And the worst thing you'll face with is contaminated which is far more dangerous than zombies!

Title: The Ditzy Demons Are in Love With Me
description: Ren’s virginity is in danger as he is suddenly pushed into the school’s special girl's dormitory full of useless demons. Assigned as an assistant to watch over them, his happy and troublesome days as a teacher for these cute but incompetent demons has begun.

description: Cherry Lady is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.
